intent_atoms.description: Wire the explorer to real file selection and trigger ParseTreeStore.start so snapshots stream from user data.
Implement additional outline filters for box categories and streaming metadata (see @todo #6).
Expose selection bindings that feed upcoming C3 detail and hex panes.

functional_units.name: File Explorer Integration
functional_units.description: Connects the explorer UI to real file selection and initiates ParseTreeStore.start to stream snapshots from user data.

functional_units.name: Outline Filters Extension
functional_units.description: Adds new outline filters for box categories and streaming metadata as specified in @todo #6.

functional_units.name: Selection Binding Exposure
functional_units.description: Provides bindings that feed selected items into upcoming detail and hex panes of C3.
